What they say

"Emmett did a wonderful job photographing my mother’s 70th birthday celebration. He was professional, polite, and blended right in with our guests. The photos beautifully captured the laughter, emotion, and special moments of the day. I’d absolutely recommend him to anyone looking for a talented young photographer."

— Sal Ibe
